name: Ghost Song
description:
The desolate moon of Lorian V is a place of curiosity, history, and terror. Awaken on the surface from a long slumber and explore the winding caverns below to uncover secrets, acquire new abilities and face powerful foes. Meet the sleepy, stranded inhabitants of Lorian V and hear their tragic stories. Only by doing all of this will you learn-- remember-- the truth.
Challenging and rewarding "Metroidvania" gameplay
Explore a large, connected, lonely world of secrets and discoveries
Precise, responsive controls
Lonely, isolated theme
Fully voiced NPCs
Acquire new powers and weapons to discover completely optional hidden areas
Feed and raise your pet into mysterious evolutions with varying effects
Touching story of family, courage, redemption and closure
